question_stem:
Quiz 6 - Naive Bayes
Consider using the dataset “bank-sample.csv” to predict whether a customer will subscribe to a bank’s services using a Naive Bayes model. Refer to the photo provided for all subsequent questions.

Question 1
Which statement about the two models formed on lines 7 - 8 is true?
A
Both models are identical
B
Both models contain the same number of explanatory features
C
M1 was trained with a smaller data set compared to M2
D
M2 contains 4 explanatory features
question_stem_html:
Quiz 6 - Naive Bayes
Consider using the dataset “bank-sample.csv” to predict whether a customer will subscribe to a bank’s services using a Naive Bayes model. Refer to the photo provided for all subsequent questions.

B

C

choices.text: oth models contain the same number of explanatory features
choices.text_html: oth models contain the same number of explanatory features

choices.text: 1 was trained with a smaller data set compared to M2
